Package minimizer.algorithms

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Algorithm
    Algorithm allows to find the minimum point of a given function function on the given interval [a, b] with the accuracy eps.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BrentAlgorithm
    The implementation of Algorithm interface that uses Brent algorithm to find the minimum.
    DichotomyAlgorithm
    The implementation of Algorithm interface that uses the dichotomy algorithm to find the minimum.
    FibonacciAlgorithm
    The implementation of Algorithm interface that uses Fibonacci algorithm to find the minimum.
    GoldenSectionSearchAlgorithm
    The implementation of Algorithm interface that uses the golden section search algorithm to find the minimum.
    ParabolaAlgorithm
    The implementation of Algorithm interface that uses the parabola algorithm to find the minimum.
